info.description: After setting up your Notification URL, we will send the notification for certain events such as when the Virtual Account has been paid by your customers, Credit Card has been charged, Credit Card failed, and etc. Once the customers finish the payment, DOKU will send the notification to your defined Notification URL.
info.title: HTTP Notification - API

post.summary: DOKU Notification URL VA Non SNAP
post.description: Here is the sample of notification request header :

parameters.name: Client-Id
parameters.description: Client ID retrieved from DOKU Back Office

parameters.name: Request-Id
parameters.description: Unique random string (max 128 characters) that generated by DOKU to make sure no duplicate notification

parameters.name: Request-Timestamp
parameters.description: Time Stamp request on UTC time in ISO8601 format

parameters.name: Signature
parameters.description: Verify the Signature to ensure the Notification Authenticity coming from DOKU

requestBody.description: Here is the sample notification request body :

200.description: Merchant Notification URL will send the response back to DOKU.

tags: Notification URL E-Wallet OVO Open API Non SNAP
post.summary: DOKU Notification URL E-Wallet OVO Open API Non SNAP
post.description: Here is the sample of notification request header :

parameters.name: Client-Id
parameters.description: Client ID retrieved from DOKU Back Office

parameters.name: Request-Id
parameters.description: Unique random string (max 128 characters) that generated by DOKU to make sure no duplicate notification

parameters.name: Request-Timestamp
parameters.description: Time Stamp request on UTC time in ISO8601 format

parameters.name: Signature
parameters.description: Verify the Signature to ensure the Notification Authenticity coming from DOKU

requestBody.description:
DOKU OVO Open API will publish 3 scenarios that are in the process before payment to after payment. Here are the cases that will be published : 
 1. Binding
2. Payment
3. Refund

200.description: Merchant Notification URL will send the response back to DOKU.

VirtualAccountRequest.description: This request is only available to these Virtual Account: BCA, Mandiri, BSI, BRI, BNI, DOKU, CIMB, Permata, Danamon

id.description: The service that is used for the transaction | Mandatory | Type: ```string```
The acquirer that processed the transaction | Mandatory | Type: ```string```
The channel of the transaction | Mandatory | Type: ```string```

status.description:
The transaction status to be use to update the status on merchant side 
Possible value: ```SUCCESS``` since VA only notify when payment is success | Mandatory | Type: ```string```

date.description: The date when the transaction is completed by the customer in ISO 8601 format (UTC + 0) | Mandatory | Type: ```string```

original_request_id.description: The request ID that sent when initiate the payment | Mandatory | Type: ```string```

invoice_number.description: Same as the request that merchant sent on the payment initiation | Mandatory | Type: ```string```

amount.description: Same as the request that merchant sent on the payment initiation | Mandatory | Type: ```number```

virtual_account_number.description: The virtual account number that used for the transaction | Optional | Type: ```string```

identifer.description: List of transaction identifier that coming from the acquiring. Merchant can save these data for reference | Optional | Type: ```array```

CreditCardRequest.description: This request for Credit Card Non SNAP

invoice_number.description: Same as the request that merchant sent on the payment initiation | Mandatory | Type: ```string```

amount.description: Same as the request that merchant sent on the payment initiation | Mandatory | Type: ```number```

id.description: Same as the request that merchant sent on the payment initiation | Mandatory | Type: ```string```

name.description: Same as the request that merchant sent on the payment initiation | Optional | Type: ```string```

email.description: Same as the request that merchant sent on the payment initiation | Optional | Type: ```string```

type.description: Transaction Type Possible value: ```SALE```,```INSTALLMENT```,```AUTHORIZE```,```MOTO``` | Mandatory | Type: ```string```

status.description:
The transaction status to be use to update the status on merchant side 
 Possible value: ```SUCCESS```,```FAILED``` | Mandatory | Type: ```string```

date.description: The date when the transaction is completed by the customer in ISO 8601 format (UTC + 0) | Mandatory | Type: ```string```

original_request_id.description: The request ID that sent when initiate the payment | Mandatory | Type: ```string```

id.description: The service that is used for the transaction | Mandatory | Type: ```string```
The acquirer that processed the transaction | Mandatory | Type: ```string```
The channel of the transaction | Mandatory | Type: ```string```

authorize_id.description: Used to capture transaction in ```Authorize Capture``` transaction  | Optional | Type: ```string```

masked_card_number.description: The masked card number that charged for this transaction | Optional | Type: ```string```

approval_code.description: Acquirer approval code for this transaction | Optional | Type: ```string```

response_code.description: DOKU / Acquirer response code | Optional | Type: ```string```

response_message.description: DOKU / Acquirer response message | Optional | Type: ```string```

ConvenienceStoreRequest.description: This request for Convenience Store Non SNAP

id.description: The service that is used for the transaction | Mandatory | Type: ```string```
The acquirer that processed the transaction | Mandatory | Type: ```string```
The channel of the transaction | Mandatory | Type: ```string```

status.description:
The transaction status to be use to update the status on merchant side 
Possible value: ```SUCCESS``` since Convenience Store only notify when payment is success | Mandatory | Type: ```string```

date.description: The date when the transaction is completed by the customer in ISO 8601 format (UTC + 0) | Mandatory | Type: ```string```

original_request_id.description: The request ID that sent when initiate the payment | Mandatory | Type: ```string```

invoice_number.description: The invoice number that sent when initate the payment | Mandatory | Type: ```string```

amount.description: The amount of the transaction | Mandatory | Type: ```number```

payment_code.description: The payment code number that used for the transaction | Mandatory | Type: ```string```

identifer.description: Same as the inquiry response | Optional | Type: ```array```

additional_info.description: Same as the additional_info from the request | Optional | Type: ```json```

date.description: The date when the transaction is completed by the customer in ISO 8601 format (UTC + 0) | Mandatory | Type: ```string```

original_request_id.description: The request ID that sent when initiate the payment | Mandatory | Type: ```string```

The acquirer that processed the transaction | Mandatory | Type: ```string```

response_code.description: DOKU / Acquirer response code | Optional | Type: ```string```

response_message.description: DOKU / Acquirer response message | Optional | Type: ```string```

PaylaterRequest.description: This request for Paylater Non SNAP

id.description: The service that is used for the transaction | Mandatory | Type: ```string```
The acquirer that processed the transaction | Mandatory | Type: ```string```
The channel of the transaction | Mandatory | Type: ```string```

invoice_number.description: Same as the request that merchant sent on the payment initiation | Mandatory | Type: ```string```

amount.description: Same as the request that merchant sent on the payment initiation | Mandatory | Type: ```number```

status.description: The transaction status to be use to update the status on merchant side Possible value: ```SUCCESS```,```FAILED``` | Mandatory | Type: ```string```

date.description: The date when the transaction is completed by the customer in ISO 8601 format (UTC + 0) | Mandatory | Type: ```string```

original_request_id.description: The request ID that sent when initiate the payment | Mandatory | Type: ```string```

merchant_unique_reference.description: The merchant unique reference that sent when initiate the payment | Mandatory | Type: ```string```

peer_to_peer_info.description: Peer to Peer information from Akulaku | Optional | Type: ```object```

ShopeePayRequest.description: This request for ShopeePay E-Wallet Non SNAP

id.description: The service that is used for the transaction | Mandatory | Type: ```string```
The acquirer that processed the transaction | Mandatory | Type: ```string```
The channel of the transaction | Mandatory | Type: ```string```

invoice_number.description: The invoice number that sent when initate the payment | Mandatory | Type: ```string```

amount.description: The amount of the transaction | Mandatory | Type: ```number```

status.description:
The transaction status to be use to update the status on merchant side 
Possible value: ```SUCCESS```,```FAILED``` | Mandatory | Type: ```string```

date.description: The date when the transaction is completed by the customer in ISO 8601 format (UTC + 0) | Mandatory | Type: ```string```

original_request_id.description: The request ID that sent when initiate the payment | Mandatory | Type: ```string```

merchant_ext_id.description: The credential from ShopeePay | Optional | Type: ```string```

store_ext_id.description: The credential from ShopeePay | Optional | Type: ```string```

transaction_status.description:
The status code from ShopeePay 
 Possible value: ```3``` for success, ```4``` for failed | Optional | Type: ```string```

transaction_message.description:
The transaction status to be use to update the status on merchant side 
 Possible value: ```SUCCESS```,```FAILED``` | Optional | Type: ```string```

identifer.description: List of transaction identifier that coming from the acquiring. Merchant can save these data for reference | Optional | Type: ```string```

OVOBindingRequest.description: This request for OVO Binding Notification E-Wallet Non SNAP

id.description: The service that is used for the transaction | Mandatory | Type: ```string```
The acquirer that processed the transaction | Mandatory | Type: ```string```
The channel of the transaction | Mandatory | Type: ```string```
Merchant customer ID | Mandatory | Type: ```string```

name.description: Customer name that sent when initiate the payment | Optional | Type: ```string```

email.description: Customer email that sent when initiate the payment | Optional | Type: ```string```

phone.description: Customer phone that sent when initiate the payment | Optional | Type: ```string```

additional_info.description: Customer additional_info that sent when initate the payment | Mandatory | Type: ```string```

issuer.description: Wallet issuer that receive on API Get List Token OVO Response | Mandatory | Type: ```string```

token_id.description: Wallet token ID that receive on API Get List Token OVO Response | Mandatory | Type: ```string```

masked_phone_number.description: Wallet Masked Phone Number that receive on API Get List Token OVO Response | Mandatory | Type: ```string```

OVOPaymentRequest.description: This request for OVO Payment Notification E-Wallet Non SNAP

id.description: The service that is used for the transaction | Mandatory | Type: ```string```
The acquirer that processed the transaction | Mandatory | Type: ```string```
The channel of the transaction | Mandatory | Type: ```string```
Merchant customer ID | Mandatory | Type: ```string```

name.description: Customer name that sent when initiate the payment | Optional | Type: ```string```

email.description: Customer email that sent when initiate the payment | Optional | Type: ```string```

phone.description: Customer phone that sent when initiate the payment | Optional | Type: ```string```

additional_info.description: Customer additional_info that sent when initate the payment | Mandatory | Type: ```string```

invoice_number.description: Merchant transaction id unique per client id | Mandatory | Type: ```string```

amount.description: Total amount in IDR | Mandatory | Type: ```number```

status.description:
Status of transaction 
Possible value: ```SUCCESS```,```FAILED``` | Mandatory | Type: ```string```

date.description: Transaction requested to Bank on UTC time in ISO8601 format | Mandatory | Type: ```string```

original_request_id.description: Request ID to DOKU API when generate payment / refund | Mandatory | Type: ```string```

ovo_id.description: Identifier ID from OVO | Mandatory | Type: ```string```

cash_used.description: Cash used in transaction | Mandatory | Type: ```string```

point_used.description: Point used in transaction | Mandatory | Type: ```string```

response_code.description: Response Code From OVO | Mandatory | Type: ```string```

response_message.description: Response Message from OVO | Mandatory | Type: ```string```

OVORefundRequest.description: This request for OVO Payment Notification E-Wallet Non SNAP

id.description: The service that is used for the transaction | Mandatory | Type: ```string```
The acquirer that processed the transaction | Mandatory | Type: ```string```
The channel of the transaction | Mandatory | Type: ```string```
Merchant customer ID | Mandatory | Type: ```string```

invoice_number.description: Merchant transaction id unique per client id | Mandatory | Type: ```string```

status.description: The transaction status to be use to update the status on merchant side Possible value: ```SUCCESS```,```FAILED``` | Mandatory | Type: ```string```

date.description: Transaction requested to Bank on UTC time in ISO8601 format | Mandatory | Type: ```string```

original_request_id.description: Request ID to DOKU API when generate payment / refund | Mandatory | Type: ```string```

ovo_id.description: Identifier ID from OVO | Mandatory | Type: ```string```

id.description: Identifier refund ID from OVO | Mandatory | Type: ```string```

ovo_cash.description: Cash used in transaction | Mandatory | Type: ```string```

ovo_point.description: Point used in transaction | Mandatory | Type: ```string```

response_code.description: Response Code From OVO | Mandatory | Type: ```string```

response_message.description: Response Message from OVO | Mandatory | Type: ```string```
